column6:
Cyclops and Emma Frost are trapped in far-out San Francisco - a city that looks and feels likes it's the summer of '69. But there's nothing groovy about this trip. Unless they can find the source of the strange transformation, Angel may lose his sanity - along with eight million other people. Meanwhile, Wolverine, Colossus and Nightcrawler face a red menace deep in the heart of Mother Russia.,2008,5
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | artist:Mike Choi | penciller (cover):Billy Tan
